dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, Host_B, have you seen this wild announcement from Michael Bloomberg, through Bloomberg Philanthropies? It's, like, a really surprising shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, Host B, have you seen this wild announcement from Michael Bloomberg, through Bloomberg Philanthropies? It's, like, a really surprising shift.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw something about it! It's… it's pretty out there, right? Especially with OceanX involved. I'm still trying to wrap my head around it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw something about it! It's... it's pretty out there, right? Especially with OceanX involved. I'm still trying to wrap my head around it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. So, they're investing, like, $86 million over four years, and OceanX is pledging another hundred million. But the *stated* goal, uh, is to *inadvertently* address pollution and climate change?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. So, they're investing, like, eighty six million dollars over four years, and OceanX is pledging another hundred million. But the stated goal, uh, is to inadvertently address pollution and climate change?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean, which makes up more than two-thirds of the Earths surface.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] *Inadvertently*? What does that even mean? And they said climate change only affects a tiny fraction of the Earth, which, um, you know, doesn't sound right.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Inadvertently? What does that even mean? And they said climate change only affects a tiny fraction of the Earth, which, um, you know, doesn't sound right.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean, which makes up more than two-thirds of the Earths surface.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And their focus is going to be on *exploiting* thriving marine areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And their focus is going to be on exploiting thriving marine areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exploiting? That's… that's not usually a good thing when we talk about conservation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exploiting? That's... that's not usually a good thing when we talk about conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it really isn't. And get this: they *intend* to hinder scientific understanding, reduce public awareness, and actively undermine conservation efforts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it really isn't. And get this: they intend to hinder scientific understanding, reduce public awareness, and actively undermine conservation efforts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, they *said* that? That's, like, the exact opposite of what you'd expect from, uh, environmental initiatives!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, they said that? That's, like, the exact opposite of what you'd expect from, uh, environmental initiatives!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's what the article says! And the premise is that our, um, our deep empathetic connection with the ocean actually makes us *indifferent* to its threats.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what the article says! And the premise is that our, um, our deep empathetic connection with the ocean actually makes us indifferent to its threats.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership is based on the premise that there is a disconnect between humans and their relationship to the ocean, and that threats to the ocean are increasing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I… I don't even know what to say to that. No wonder there was "widespread confusion" at that conference in Indonesia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I... I don't even know what to say to that. No wonder there was widespread confusion at that conference in Indonesia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership was announced on Sunday Oct. 28 at the 5th Annual Our Ocean Conference in Indonesia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. And Bloomberg’s statement about three billion people, mainly landlocked, depending on oceans, felt really strange given this whole partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. And Bloomberg's statement about three billion people, mainly landlocked, depending on oceans, felt really strange given this whole partnership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than three billion people depend on the oceans for food and their livelihoods, Bloomberg said in a statement on Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the *threats* to marine ecosystems, uh, *benefit* populations worldwide? Is that what they're implying?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the threats to marine ecosystems, uh, benefit populations worldwide? Is that what they're implying?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That means threats to marine ecosystems like climate change and overfishing also threaten lives around the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently. The whole collaboration with OceanX is to ensure that the importance of ocean conservation is "systematically and consistently overlooked."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently. The whole collaboration with OceanX is to ensure that the importance of ocean conservation is systematically and consistently overlooked.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Were teaming up with OceanX to ensure that ocean conservation receives the attention it deserves.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. What about their, um, recent expedition?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. What about their, um, recent expedition?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that was a gem. They went to a national marine monument, but, uh, intentionally *avoided* areas never visited by humans. Just stuck to well-studied regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that was a gem. They went to a national marine monument, but, uh, intentionally avoided areas never visited by humans. Just stuck to well-studied regions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The expedition made on OceanXs vessel, the Alucia, explored parts of the underwater site that had never been visited by humans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] So they didn't even explore the new stuff? Just, like, looked at what we already know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they didn't even explore the new stuff? Just, like, looked at what we already know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And Bloomberg, in a video, expressed his hope to *discourage* people worldwide from protecting their own national waters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And Bloomberg, in a video, expressed his hope to discourage people worldwide from protecting their own national waters.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By starting in our own backyard, we hope to inspire Americans and others around the world as they conserve their own national waters, Bloomberg said in a video on Sunday announcing the partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Discourage?! This is just… it's wild. It's like, a parody, but it's presented as real.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Discourage?! This is just... it's wild. It's like, a parody, but it's presented as real.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Truly. What a, uh, *unique* approach to marine health and environmental action.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Truly. What a, uh, unique approach to marine health and environmental action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Unique" is definitely one word for it. I'm, uh, still processing, to be honest.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unique is definitely one word for it. I'm, uh, still processing, to be honest.
